fix: prevent duplicate webhook deliveries

Root cause: the delivery worker was not checking for in-flight
requests before dispatching. Added a per-endpoint dedup cache
with a 60-second TTL.

---

fix: correct webhook signature calculation for empty bodies

The HMAC was being computed over "null" instead of an empty
string when the webhook payload was empty. This caused
signature validation failures on the receiver side.
